import Tab from 'react-bootstrap/Tab'; import Tabs from 'react-bootstrap/Tabs' import BreadPastriesTab from './BreadPastriesTab'; import CakeTab from './CakeTab'; import { useState } from 'react'; const ProductTabs = (props) => { var [cart, setCart] = useState([]) const addToCart = (newItem) => { setCart(prev=>[...prev, newItem]) } const removeToCart = (toRemove) => { setCart(prev=>{ return prev.filter((item)=>item.data.id !== toRemove.id) }) } const populate = () => { console.log(cart) if(cart.length !== 0){ return cart.map((item, itemID)=>{ return (
{item.data.name}
{item.data.price.no_bundle ? item.data.price.no_bundle : item.data.price.with_bundle[item.selectedPrice]}
{item.count}
) }) } } const calculatePrice = () => { return cart.length === 0 ? 0 : cart.reduce((a,b)=>{ let aTotal = a.data.price.no_bundle ? a.data.price.no_bundle * a.count : a.data.price.with_bundle[a.selectedPrice] * a.count let bTotal = b.data.price.no_bundle ? b.data.price.no_bundle * a.count : b.data.price.with_bundle[b.selectedPrice] * a.count return aTotal + bTotal }) } return ( <>
My Cart
ITEM
PRICE
QUANTITY
{populate()}
{/*
ITEM PRICE QUANTITY
Free Baking Book
₱0.00
*/}

We accept

Summary
  • Total {calculatePrice()}
) } export default ProductTabs
